sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="onClick" :class="classValue" class="button">
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Button',
  props: {
    type: String
  },
  computed: {
    classValue() {
      return {
        'button-primary': this.type === 'primary',
        'button-secondary': this.type === 'secondary',
        'button-ghost': this.type === 'ghost',
        'button-full': this.type === true,
      };
    },
  }
  };
</script>

<style lang='scss' scoped>
.button {
  width: 200px;
  height: 50px;
  border-radius: 25px;
  border: none;
  // background: none;
  font-weight: bold;
  // font-family: "Roboto";
  &-primary {
    width: 335px;
  height: 50px;
  border-radius: 25px;
  border: none;
  background-color: red;
  font-weight: bold;
  // font-family: arial;
  }
  &-ghost {
    background-color: white;
  }
}


</style>
